thread.title: BRIEF-Further Proposed Simplified Cash Tender Offer For Euler Hermes Group Shares Followed By A Squeeze-Out​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Further Proposed Simplified Cash Tender Offer For Euler Hermes Group Shares Followed By A Squeeze-Out​
text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - EULER HERMES GROUP SA:
* REG-EULER HERMES GROUP: FURTHER PROPOSED SIMPLIFIED CASH TENDER OFFER FOR EULER HERMES GROUP SHARES FOLLOWED BY A SQUEEZE-OUT
* ALLIANZ INTENDS TO FILE IN COMING WEEKS A FURTHER SIMPLIFIED CASH TENDER OFFER AT A PRICE OF 122 EUROS PER SHARE ​
* ‍SQUEEZE-OUT REMAINING 1,998,131 EULER HERMES GROUP SHARES, REPRESENTING 4.69% OF SHARE CAPITAL​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
